DOC.brief_summary: The majority today 's youth engage enough physical activity ( PA ) maintain good health . Low PA level associate poor health ( e.g . diabetes , high blood pressure ) early mortality . Girls less likely boy active , rate participation drop steeply adolescence . Girls report many barrier exercise , include transportation issue feel self-conscious appearance ability . School-based PA program try improve health , mainly aerobic exercise education , small effect date . However , program include resistance training focus show strong improvement health related measure . In project , examine effect female strength condition specialist decrease barrier increase overall health high school girl , delivery in-school , girls-only resistance training program . We see physical mental health change training , presence S & C specialist affect girls ' social interaction within school . The result help individual education sector plan program service improve overall youth school health .
